wizard.name: Searching conference rooms mobile sample project
wizard.description: Imports a mobile sample project allowing to search a conference room, and localize them on a map. The project is based on jQuery Mobile and CTF frameworks, and uses the local cache. When the mobile application receives a response from Convertigo, it is cached locally thanks to JavaScript code. When the mobile application cannot reach Convertigo, or cannot access the network, or when data is stored locally, the local data are used.

wizard.name: CTF gallery sample project
wizard.description: Imports the CTF gallery project, demonstrating several functionalities of the Convertigo Templating Framework library.

wizard.name: Mobile US Directory sample project
wizard.description: Imports a sample project creating a US Directory mobile application. The project is based on jQuery Mobile and CTF frameworks, and makes searches on the US Directory website to dynamically get data. It also uses the local cache. When the mobile application receives a response from Convertigo, it is cached locally thanks to JavaScript code. When the mobile application cannot reach Convertigo, or cannot access the network, or when data is stored locally, the local data are used.

wizard.name: MobTV sample project
wizard.description: Imports a sample project creating a MobTV mobile application. The project is based on jQuery Mobile and CTF frameworks, and makes searches on the programme-tv.net website to dynamically get data. It also uses the local cache. When the mobile application receives a response from Convertigo, it is cached locally thanks to JavaScript code. When the mobile application cannot reach Convertigo, or cannot access the network, or when data is stored locally, the local data are used.

wizard.name: Vacations sample project
wizard.description: Imports a vacation management mobile application sample project. The project is based on jQuery Mobile and CTF frameworks, and uses fake data from XML files in the project loaded thanks to a sequence.

wizard.name: AngularJS sample project
wizard.description: Imports a sample mobile AngularJS application project.

wizard.name: Polymer sample project
wizard.description: Imports a sample mobile Polymer application project.

wizard.name: OffChat sample project
wizard.description: Imports a project creating a sampleOffChat application. This application demonstrates FullSync technology used to an “Offline Chat” application. This app enables users to establish conversations between them and chat using text messages and photos. When the device is online, messages will flow from one to the other immediately, using FullSync “live” replications. If the device if offline, posts will be secured in the local FullSync NoSQL database and will be synced automatically when the device is online again.

wizard.name: RetailStore sample project
wizard.description: Imports a project creating a sampleRetailStore application. This application demonstrates FullSync technology used for a mobile retail store application where the user can browse a catalog of products downloaded on his mobile phone. For this demo, the data come from a static XML file imported in the FullSync server database. When the mobile application is launched, a first step will be done to import the data in the server database, then the data will be “synced” on the mobile device. Be sure to install a CouchDB server on your workstation before running this demo.

wizard.name: MapperShop sample project
wizard.description: Imports a project being exposed as a REST service through its URL mapper. The project is a very simplistic shop which data are stored into a local HSQLDB database.

wizard.name: HelloWorld sample project
wizard.description: Imports a sample project containing each type of connector.

wizard.description: Imports an HSQLDB database sample project.
